SELECT psr.key_id, psr.player_id, pi.player_name, psr.match_id, sum(psr.score) as score, sum(psr.assisting_score) as assisting_score, sum(psr.block_shot_score) as block_shot_score, sum(psr.backboard_score) as backboard_score, sum(psr.tackle_score) as tackle_score FROM player_score_record psr LEFT JOIN player_info pi ON pi.key_id = psr.player_id where psr.delete_flag = 0 and pi.delete_flag = 0
AND pi.player_name LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{playerName}, '%')
group by psr.player_id ORDER BY pi.create_time DESC
